amendment.description: Amendment allows the property taxes paid on mobile homes, insurance payments, utilities and financing to be included as components of the housing costs eligible for Section 8 payments.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 8 printed in House Report 114-411 to allow the property taxes paid on mobile homes, insurance payments, utilities and financing to be included as components of the housing costs eligible for Section 8 payments.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Welch amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Welch.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Welch amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
